channel.title: Project Czar: Removing the wildy signs?
channel.description:
Hey, I need help with editing a small part of Project Czar. I'm trying to remove the wildy sign because in some places of the game (out of the wild) it shows, and comes in negative numbers. Here is a picture:
[IMG]http://i209.photobucket.com/albums/bb205/sithling/wildy.jpg[/img]
Any help will be very much appreciated. Thanks, Sithling

item.title: Project Czar: Removing the wildy signs?
item.dc:creator: @JRealm JRealm
item.description:
@JRealm wrote:

/* Safezone Class written by JRealm */
public class safeDemo {

safeDemo()
{
System.out.println("Created by Paintball199/JRealm. 100% Typed.");
}

private boolean InSafezone() {//Written for Sithling, By JRealm.
int absX, absY;
if((absX >= x && absX <= x && absY >= y && absY <= y) || heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

private void wildFrames() {
if(!InSafezone()) {
sendQuest("@red@Oh Realy?", 199);
} else { sendQuest("@gre@IM SAFE!", 199); }}

}

Made By JRealm. Written in 3 Minutes & 8 seconds.

Read full topic

[code]public void viewTo(int coordX, int coordY) {
viewToX = ((2 * coordX) + 1);
viewToY = ((2 * coordY) + 1);
dirUpdate2Required = true;
updateRequired = true;
}

} if (nonWild()){
outStream.createFrame(208); // woot new pk server by Mod Mohsin
outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197);
sendQuest("@gre@Safe", 199);
}
